name: Emmon Gray
description:
A 1/2 piece in the collection of characters from the upcoming graphic novel series, Veil Of The Gods. Each chapter of this series will be released soon, each as a rare NFT.


Emmon Gray is a researcher who dedicated her life to creating new vessels in which consciousness may dwell. She called her creations Quasi-Autonomous Beings but most people call them Kwasis. Her first creation was a bio-mechanical version of herself, with an advanced A.I. installed and a range of selected memories. The creation outlived the creator and began a search for meaning, eventually being drawn to the arcane technology known as Mahjuti.
